Project2

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • jig.Entity
      • Project2.BasicBeing
        • Project2.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends BasicBeing
    client players will be of type Hero which extends BasicBeing; the screen position for client Hero is in the center of the screen.
